title: Bug 48551StringCache: Use entrySet() rather than keySet() + get()
description: Created attachment 24846 [details]Replace keySet() + get(key) with entrySet()Using entrySet() to iterate over a map is faster than using keySet() followed by get(key).Sample patch attached.There are quite a few other examples elsewhere in the Tomcat code.I can provide patches for those if required.
